message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be incredibly valuable to your business. While I can't disclose the specifics just yet, I can assure you it's worth at least $1,500,000 to you. I'm willing to part with it for $1,400,000.  This is a significant opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset at a competitive price. Let me know if you'd like to discuss further.
